name: Green House Call
description: Free online energy assessment plus free lightbulbs, shower heads, and other energy/water saving measures
fullDescription: Rising Sun Center for Opportunity provides free virtual energy assessments and ships free energy and water-saving products directly to Bay Area residents at no cost.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free virtual energy assessment
- Free LED lightbulbs shipped to you
- Free low-flow shower heads
- Free faucet aerators
- Free smart power strips
- Personalized energy-saving tips
- Youth employment program benefit
howToGetIt:
1. Complete online survey on Rising Sun website
2. Schedule virtual Green House Call
3. Meet with trained youth intern virtually
4. Receive personalized recommendations
5. Free products shipped to your home
6. No cost or obligation
keywords: Rising Sun, Green House Call, free LED, free showerhead, free assessment, energy savings, water savings, virtual, shipped to you
